thread.title: Former Holy Cross Center, Game of Thrones Actor Neil Fingleton Dies at Age 36
thread.title_full: Former Holy Cross Center, Game of Thrones Actor Neil Fingleton Dies at Age 36

author: Joseph Zucker
title: Former Holy Cross Center, Game of Thrones Actor Neil Fingleton Dies at Age 36
text: Former Holy Cross Center, Game of Thrones Actor Neil Fingleton Dies at Age 36 Chris Jackson/Getty Images Joseph Zucker Featured Columnist February 27, 2017 Neil Fingleton, who played college basketball at North Carolina and Holy Cross, has died, the Press Association (via the Guardian ) reported Sunday. Following the conclusion of his basketball career in 2007, which included professional leagues in England and Spain, Fingleton had acting roles in X-Men: First Class and 47 Ronin before playing Mag the Mighty in an episode of Game of Thrones . More to follow.
